title: Mystic Masquerade
description: The player gains entry to an exclusive masquerade ball where attendees are hiding magical secrets. Unmask the truth behind a series of mysterious disappearances.
subquest: Investigate the ballroom for clues about the disappearances.
Uncover the hidden identities of suspicious masked guests.
Solve puzzles to access secret rooms and uncover hidden truths.
Gather information from gossiping attendees to piece the puzzle together.
Confront the mastermind orchestrating the disappearances.
Lift the enchantment on the ball, restoring peace and revealing secrets.
